# Packages

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(lubridate))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(readr))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(janitor))
library(gt)
library(here)
```

```{r}
 zoomus_users_2020_10_06 <- read_csv("data/zoomus_users_2020-10-06.csv", 
  col_types = cols(`Last Login(UTC)` = col_datetime(format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), 
      `Creation Date` = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"))) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(SO_email = str_detect(email, "shambhalaonline.org"))
```

```{r}
zoomus_users_2020_10_06 %>% 
  filter(SO_email == TRUE & department == "Shambhala") %>% 
  select(email, first_name, last_name, last_login_utc)
```

```{r}
zoomus_users_2020_10_06 %>% count(user_type, department)
```
